allow: Bash(venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "import sqlite3; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''playground/testhouse.db''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT class_year_id, class_name, grad_year FROM CLASS_YEARS ORDER BY display_order''\); print\(''\\n''.join\([f''{row[0]}: {row[1]} - Graduating {row[2]}'' for row in cursor.fetchall\(\)]\)\); conn.close\(\)")
